sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:10:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Chop cucumber, tomato, and red onion into bite-sized pieces. 2. In a large bowl, combine chopped vegetables, pitted kalamata olives, and crumbled feta cheese. 3. Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar. 4. Sprinkle with dried oregano, salt, and pepper. 5. Toss gently to combine. 6. Serve immediately.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Greek">03495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd1</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Cucumber (1), Tomato (2), Red Onion (1/2</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Salads">c5c51a9f9751021069a3b6fce053af8f</meal_type> <name>Greek Salad</name> <nutrition>Calories: 250, Protein: 10g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 15g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Chop cucumber, tomato, and red onion.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:10:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>38ac87979795021069a3b6fce053af9f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
